supplies.defenceless.description: Your shield shatters; your sword breaks when struck by an enemy; or your armour straps rip and come apart. Unable to hold your foes off for any longer, you are run through or mauled and left for dead. [Immediate]
supplies.pitch_black.name: Pitch Black
supplies.pitch_black.description: Unable to see, you are dragged away by darkling creatures, never to return. [Immediate]
supplies.plummet.name: Plummet
supplies.plummet.description: Your line snaps; your hooks don't hold; your pick shears away and tumbles into a chasm. Whatever it is, you plunge into the darkness beneath and do not return.[Immediate]
supplies.starvation.name: Starvation
supplies.starvation.description: You starve to death or are overcome by dehydration. [Immediate]

tag.awkward.name: Awkward
tag.awkward.description: The resource is heavy or hard to carry.
tag.beacon.name: Beacon
tag.beacon.description: the resource attracts something dangerous towards its position.
tag.block.name: Block
tag.bloodbound.name: Bloodbound
tag.bloodbound.description: Mark D4 stress to Blood to roll with mastery when using this equipment for the rest of the situation.
tag.brutal.name: Brutal
tag.brutal.description: When you roll for stress against an adversary when using this item, roll two dice and pick the highest. Multiple instances of this tag stack: if you managed to get it three times, you???d roll four dice and pick the highest when calculating stress.
tag.conduit.name: Conduit
tag.conduit.description: Mark D4 stress to Mind to roll with mastery when using this equipment for the rest of the situation.
tag.dangerous.name: Dangerous
tag.dangerous.description: When you inflict stress with this item and roll the maximum amount, mark D6 stress to Blood.
tag.debilitating.name: Debilitating
tag.debilitating.description: Once per situation, when you inflict stress with this item to one or more targets, the next attack made against them is rolled with mastery.
tag.degenerating.name: Degenerating
tag.degenerating.description: If you take damage from a weapon with this tag, roll Endure+[Domain] at the end of the situation.On a failure, mark D6 stress; on a partial success, mark D4 stress; on a success, mark none.
tag.deteriorating.name: Deteriorating
tag.deteriorating.description: The resource is breaking down, rotting or rusting and you'll need to get it to a new owner quickly.
tag.distressing.name: Distressing
tag.distressing.description: When you inflict stress with this item and roll the maximum amount, mark D6 stress to Mind.
tag.double_barreled.name: Double-Barreled
tag.double_barreled.description: This equipment must be reloaded between every two uses, giving enemies a chance to close in or flee.
tag.expensive.name: Expensive
tag.expensive.description: When you inflict stress with this item and roll the maximum amount, mark D6 stress to Supplies.
tag.extreme_range.name: Extreme Range
tag.extreme_range.description: This item can be used at extreme range.
tag.fragile.name: Fragile
tag.fragile.description: The resource will be destroyed if dropped or damaged.
tag.harmful.name: Harmful
tag.harmful.description: The resource has the capacity to harm those who carry it via black magic, illness or strange energies.
tag.limited(X).name: Limited ${X}
tag.limited(X).description: You can use this ${X} times before it gives out.
tag.loud.name: Loud
tag.loud.description: When you inflict stress with this item and roll the maximum amount, mark D6 stress to Fortune.
tag.mobile.name: Mobile
tag.mobile.description: If left unattended, the resource will leave of its own accord.
tag.niche.name: Niche
tag.niche.description: The resource is only valuable to a very select group of people.
tag.obscuring.name: Obscuring
tag.obscuring.description: The bearer and any nearby allies reduce the damage of incoming and outgoing ranged weapons by 1 step.
tag.one_shot.name: One-Shot
tag.one_shot.description: This equipment takes a very long time to prepare, so you can only use it once per situation.
tag.piercing.name: Piercing
tag.piercing.description: You cannot reduce stress inflicted by this equipment by using Blood Protection, and adversaries do not benefit from their protection value.
tag.point_blank.name: Point-Blank
tag.point_blank.description: This equipment can be used at range, but at very close range it increases its stress dice by one step. If the shot travels far enough to spread out and dissipate, it lowers its stress dice by one step.
tag.potent.name: Potent
tag.potent.description: When you roll for stress removed from yourself or an ally with this item, roll two dice and pick the highest. Multiple instances of this tag stack as per the Brutal tag.
tag.ranged.name: Ranged
tag.ranged.description: This equipment can be used at range.
tag.reload.name: Reload
tag.reload.description: This equipment must be reloaded between uses, giving enemies a chance to close in or flee.
tag.smoke.name: Smoke
tag.smoke.description: When the item is used, any nearby allies around the area reduce the damage of incoming and outgoing ranged weapons by 1 step.
tag.spread.name: Spread
tag.spread.description: Anyone standing near the target on a successful use must roll Evade+[Domain] (or another applicable skill) to avoid marking stress as well. On a partial success, downgrade the stress dice by one size. NPCs caught in a blast simply take the stress.
tag.taboo.name: Taboo
tag.taboo.description: The resource isn't accepted for barter in most haunts (e.g. organs from heartsblooded people,gold teeth or certain narcotics).
tag.tiring.name: Tiring
tag.tiring.description: When you fail an action using this equipment, the size of its stress dice decreases by 1 for the remainder of the situation.
tag.trusty.name: Trusty
tag.trusty.description: When you roll for stress marked against a delve while using this item, roll two dice and pick the highest.Multiple instances of this tag stack as per the Brutal tag.
tag.unreliable.name: Unreliable
tag.unreliable.description: When you fail an action using this equipment, it cannot be used for the remainder of the situation if in a landmark or for the remainder of the journey if on a delve.
tag.volatile.name: Volatile
tag.volatile.description: The resource may explode if mistreated.
tag.wyrd.name: Wyrd
tag.wyrd.description: When you inflict stress with this item and roll the maximum amount, mark D6 stress to Echo.

Option to display Total Stress on character sheet.
Option to display an editable field beside each Resistance that can be edited if you don't like ticking boxes.
Added a Tag icon to help distinguish Equipment and Resource tags.
Updated the default icon for Landmarks.

Added propeties to delves including Resistance, maxResistance, Domains, Tier, Resources, Equipment, Connections, and notes.

You can now alt-click an equipment roll to decrease the die by one step when rolling with a critical success or other modifier.
notes: Updated the listeners on actors to be located on the base actor for less repetition of code
